means: [地名] [厄瓜多尔] 科塔卡奇

means.word_mean: 1. an Andean volcano in northern Ecuador; last erupted in 1955

auth_sentence.content: The Cuicocha lagoon was born from a river of tears coming down the slopes of Mt Cotacachi.
